page_content:
Hunter Macdonald Limited

Application Discovery and Migration Services

Application Migration Services for Discovery, Assessment and Migration of applications from local / on-premise to cloud-based solutions (IaaS, SaaS, PaaS). Hunter Macdonald provides Design, Build, Test, Migration and Service Integration services for Public, Hybrid, Community, Private, Cloud to Cloud, On-premise to Cloud, Legacy Applications, Cloud Readiness and Application Migration solutions.

Features

  • Application Discovery and Anlaysis to support Migration, Planning and Design
  • Application Rationalisation, Inventory Analysis, Roadmap, Transition Plan, business case
  • GDS Design Manual compliant Application Design & Delivery
  • Application Migration and Transformation, Application Transition, Application Design and Delivery
  • Local / On-premise Hosted to Cloud, Cloud-to-Cloud Migration
  • IaaS Migration, SaaS Migration, PaaS Migration, SaaS Transition, PaaS Transition
  • Re-host Application, Re-host Legacy Application, Data Migration, Data Cutover
  • Business Transition to Cloud Based Services
  • Cloud Service Provider review, selection and support
  • Service Integrator, Service Integration and Management of Cloud Services

Benefits

  • Fixed price or SFIA, to best suit your business requirements
  • Outcome and deliverable based – ensuring business benefits are achieved
  • Identify cost reductions / savings (redundant applications or services)
  • Focus on cloud based services to achieve cost savings
  • Achieving business outcomes using cloud technology as an enabler
  • Achieving the required deliverables and outcomes for the client
  • Driving delivery and service excellence using the cloud
  • Proven methodology from experienced team in cloud technology adoption
  • Integrated Infrastructure (IaaS) and Application (SaaS / PaaS) services
  • SC cleared resources, Security Cleared resources

Pricing

£522 per person per day

  • Including VAT
  • Education pricing available
  • Termination costs apply
  • Minimum contract period: Day
